Freshly graduated with a master degree in software engineering, having made a retraining in FullStack JS Web Developer.I'm a web developer with a focus on the MERN stack, but still exploring other technologies and frameworks that catch my interest! if you're looking for a developer to add to your team, I'd love to hear from you! ðŸ’œ

projects.title: Stent Appp
projects.description: The most interesting application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Stent helps you discover the secrets of LinkedIn and get practical tips on how to apply them to your profile..

projects.title: Project Management
projects.description: I was asked to build a simple backend & Frontend for a Project Management type of Application In less than 48 hours :)

projects.title: Hackaton with Go My Code (48h)
projects.description: One of the first Hackaton I was participating on my cursus. I had to develop front-end implementation for STB Bank with a team of four person. This was a hackaton lasts 48 hours. I've learned a lot!

projects.title: Test Unitaire
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
